Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mountain Stance]

You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Mountain Stronghold]

Special If you have this feat, the Dexterity modifier cap to your AC while you're in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mountain Stance] increases from +0 to +1.
